infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow ZinoRooms to access your camera for QR code scanning and ID verification.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow ZinoRooms to access your photos for uploading profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow ZinoRooms to access your microphone.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow ZinoRooms to add your bookings to your calendar.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow ZinoRooms to access your contacts for referral invitations.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow ZinoRooms to use your location to find nearby hotels.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow ZinoRooms to use your location to find nearby hotels.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow ZinoRooms to use your location to find nearby hotels.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ZinoRooms to access your camera for QR code scanning and ID verification.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow ZinoRooms to access your microphone.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow ZinoRooms to access your photos for uploading profile pictures and ID documents.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow ZinoRooms to take photos for profile pictures and ID verification.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow ZinoRooms to add your bookings to your calendar.
